    说明
    List<Transaction>
    BillController.getCachedTransactions(String username)
    Retrieves cached transactions for a user, refreshing the cache if expired.

    BillController.getFilteredTransactions(String username, String startYearMonth, String endYearMonth)
    Filters transactions for a user within the specified date range.

    TransactionController.readAllTransactions()
    Reads all transactions from the CSV file, regardless of the user.
    static List<Transaction>
    TransactionController.readTransactions(String username)
    Reads all transactions for a specific user from the CSV file.

    方法
    说明
    private String
    BillController.getFieldValue(Transaction t, String field)
    Retrieves the value of a specified field from a transaction, returning "Unclassified" if empty.
    类型变量类型为Transaction的Controller中的方法参数
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    Map<String,Double>
    BillController.calculateExpenseCategoryTotals(List<Transaction> transactions, String categoryField)
    Calculates total expense amounts by category field for the given transactions.
    Map<String,Double>
    BillController.calculateIncomeCategoryTotals(List<Transaction> transactions, String categoryField)
    Calculates total income amounts by category field for the given transactions.
    static boolean
    TransactionController.hasAbnormalTransactions(String username, List<Transaction> transactions)
    Checks for abnormal transactions for a given user based on the provided transaction list.

    说明

    BudgetService.calculateCurrentMonthExpense(List<Transaction> transactions, LocalDate now)
    Calculates the total expenses for the current month based on transaction data.

    BudgetService.calculateCurrentMonthIncome(List<Transaction> transactions, LocalDate now)

    Identifies large consumption transactions for the current month based on income threshold.
    private String
    BudgetService.findTopExpenseType(List<Transaction> transactions, LocalDate now)
    Identifies the top expense category for the current month.
